data.title: King Charles Emmanuel III (of Sardinia)
data.text:
7 Children of King Charles Emmanuel III (of Sardinia) and Princess Polyxene Christine Johanna (of Hesse-Rheinfels-Rothenburg)

Children

Prince Son (of Sardinia) 2 b. 1725

King Vittorio Amedeo II (of Sardinia)+ 1 b. 26 Jun 1726, d. 16 Oct 1796

Princess Eleonora Maria Teresa (of Sardinia) 2 b. 28 Feb 1728, d. 15 Aug 1781

Princess Maria Lodovica Gabriella (of Sardinia) 2 b. 25 Mar 1729, d. 22 Aug 1767

Princess Maria Felicita (of Sardinia) 2 b. 19 Mar 1730, d. 13 May 1801

Prince Emanuele Filiberto Giovanni Carlo (of Sardinia) 2 b. 17 May 1731, d. 24 Mar 1735

Prince Carlo Francesco Romualdo (of Sardinia) 2 b. 23 Jul 1733, d. 23 Dec 1733
